summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The AM_STREAM_INFO structure contains stream-control information.

member.name: AM_STREAM_INFO.tStart
member.summary: Time when the pin will start streaming data.

member.name: AM_STREAM_INFO.tStop
member.summary: Time when the pin will stop streaming data.

member.name: AM_STREAM_INFO.dwStartCookie
member.summary: Value that will be sent with the event notification when the pin starts.

member.name: AM_STREAM_INFO.dwStopCookie
member.summary: Value that will be sent with the event notification when the pin stops.

member.name: AM_STREAM_INFO.dwFlags
member.summary: Bitwise combination of zero or more flags from the enumeration.
